video.title: Designated Survivor
video.synopsis: America's fate rests in the hands of a low-level official after an attack on Washington decimates the government in this gripping political thriller.

episodes.synopsis: When a bomb kills the president and other top politicians, demure Cabinet member Tom Kirkman must suddenly take the reins of a government in chaos.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: The day after the bombing, President Kirkman faces down a rogue governor, and a nascent conspiracy forms. The FBI begins its hunt for the bombers.
episodes.title: The First Day

episodes.synopsis: Wells advances her theory of the bombing after a militant group claims responsibility, and Kirkman gets a taste of cutthroat political maneuvering.
episodes.title: The Confession

episodes.synopsis: While a strike against Majid Nassar takes shape, treasonous provocations from a governor and military top brass challenge President Kirkman's resolve.
episodes.title: The Enemy

episodes.synopsis: A cryptic clue about the Capitol leads Wells to a jolting discovery, and Kirkman wrestles with ordering a risky SEAL team strike against Majid Nassar.
episodes.title: The Mission

episodes.synopsis: While Kirkman tries to win over state governors skeptical of his legitimacy, Wells and Atwood squeeze Majid Nassar for the truth about the bombing.
episodes.title: The Interrogation

episodes.synopsis: Atwood's suspicions about MacLeish walk a dangerously fine line, and an American hero arrested in Russia sparks an international espionage crisis.
episodes.title: The Traitor

episodes.synopsis: A fresh act of terrorism imperils the country's new elections, Kirkman faces a reckoning with Leo, and Atwood makes a wrenching confession.
episodes.title: The Results

episodes.synopsis: Wells's investigation yields damning evidence against a high-placed official, and an NSA whistleblower leads Kirkman to an alarming revelation.
episodes.title: The Blueprint

episodes.synopsis: Suspecting a traitor in their midst, Kirkman taps Emily to investigate. Wells zeroes in on her nameless informant and uncovers a critical new threat.
episodes.title: The Oath

episodes.synopsis: In the aftermath of bloodshed, a conspiracy unfolds and MacLeish makes a daring power play. Wells leaves Ritter a trail of clues to her discovery.
episodes.title: Warriors

episodes.synopsis: Faced with revelations of treachery, Kirkman lays a snare of his own. Wells chases down a lead and triggers a dramatic turning point.
episodes.title: The End of the Beginning

episodes.synopsis: On the heels of news that shocks the nation, a combative reporter exposes top-secret information and Wells zeroes in on the source of the conspiracy.
episodes.title: Backfire

episodes.synopsis: Wells turns up a crucial witness to the conspiracy, and a belligerent guerrilla warlord in Africa puts President Kirkman's resolve to the test.
episodes.title: Commander-in-Chief

episodes.synopsis: A hot-button issue jeopardizes Kirkman's efforts to move the government out of crisis mode. A fingerprint leads Wells and Atwood into a deadly trap.
episodes.title: One Hundred Days

episodes.synopsis: Politics and partisanship erode Kirkman's efforts to pass gun legislation, and Wells investigates a shady military contractor in North Dakota.
episodes.title: Party Lines

episodes.synopsis: Political battle lines are drawn over appointing a new Supreme Court. Wells and Atwood dig deeper into the renegade group in North Dakota.
episodes.title: The Ninth Seat

episodes.synopsis: A scandal threatens to sideline Hookstraten, journalist Abe Leonard follows a lead from a mysterious informant, and Wells provokes the conspirators.
episodes.title: Lazarus

episodes.synopsis: Atwood tracks a slippery alt-right leader. Ritter hunts for Wells. As an ethics probe heats up, Hookstraten joins Kirkman to fight for arts education.
episodes.title: Misalliance

episodes.synopsis: An explosive story about the Capitol bombing threatens to subvert Kirkman's first NATO summit agenda. Ritter and Russink lay a trap for the traitor.
episodes.title: Bombshell

episodes.synopsis: While the conspirators make a surprise move, the FBI scrambles to arrest the ringleader. Kirkman asks Aaron to smoke out the White House traitor.
episodes.title: Brace for Impact

episodes.synopsis: A hijacked plane hands Kirkman an international crisis. A White House advisor shakes things up. Wells tracks Lloyd across the globe with a new ally.
episodes.title: One Year In

episodes.synopsis: A break in the manhunt for Lloyd precipitates a drastic showdown, forcing Kirkman to weigh the law against an imminent threat.
episodes.title: Sting of the Tail

episodes.synopsis: A virulent flu outbreak slips out of control. Tensions erupt over a Confederate monument. Rennett and Wells ferret out damaging new clues.
episodes.title: Outbreak

episodes.synopsis: A deadly incident at the U.S.-Mexico border throws stalled trade negotiations into chaos. The first lady faces questions about a brewing scandal.
episodes.title: Equilibrium

episodes.synopsis: Kirkman faces plummeting public trust in the wake of an incendiary off-the-cuff remark. Wells and Rennett probe the murder of a British politician.
episodes.title: Suckers

episodes.synopsis: The crew of a U.S. warship becomes stranded in hostile waters after colliding with a civilian vessel. Wells and Rennett confront a hostage situation.
episodes.title: Two Ships

episodes.synopsis: Kirkman faces a diplomatic dilemma, lawsuits threaten to consume his family, and Moss stonewalls Wells’s investigation.
episodes.title: Family Ties

episodes.synopsis: During a secret trip to Afghanistan, Kirkman negotiates with influential warlords and Wells comes under fire. Back home, Seth lands in legal trouble.
episodes.title: Home

episodes.synopsis: Kirkman dispatches his staff to investigate a war hero's legacy, a man on death row and a bee colony's collapse. Wells follows a trail of dirty money.
episodes.title: Three Letter Day

episodes.synopsis: Religious zealots in the path of a raging wildfire square off with the White House over their convictions. Wells digs for the truth behind a betrayal.
episodes.title: Line of Fire

episodes.synopsis: While Kirkman struggles to face a staggering loss, Wells and a trade delegation to Havana become a high-stakes bargaining chip for Cuban rebels.
episodes.title: Grief

episodes.synopsis: Wells races to find the culprit after a hack on NASA imperils astronauts aboard the space station. Kirkman confronts a trusted but defiant advisor.
episodes.title: The Final Frontier

episodes.synopsis: Native Americans staging a White House sit-in compel Kirkman to remedy a past mistake. Wells leans on a Russian spy in her hunt for the hackers.
episodes.title: Original Sin

episodes.synopsis: Kirkman clashes with the capital's mayor when a power outage throws the city into chaos. Chuck deciphers a clue buried in the hackers' code.
episodes.title: In the Dark

episodes.synopsis: Emily chases a White House leak that jeopardizes high-stakes peace talks between a rogue nation and its neighbor. A defector begs Wells for help.
episodes.title: Summit

episodes.synopsis: On the heels of a historic peace agreement, a dirty bomb smuggled into the country threatens to ignite a war. Wells confronts a baffling double cross.
episodes.title: Fallout

episodes.synopsis: Waging a retaliatory war against the country behind the dirty bomb, Kirkman sends Wells into the combat zone to negotiate with a rebel leader.
episodes.title: Overkill

episodes.synopsis: Leaked therapy records precipitate a constitutional crisis that engulfs Kirkman and the White House. Wells, Rennett and Chuck close in on the hackers.
episodes.title: Kirkman Agonistes

episodes.synopsis: With his presidency in turmoil, Kirkman preps for a hearing on his fitness for office. Wells shares her suspicions about the hacker's identity.
episodes.title: Capacity

episodes.synopsis: After the murder of a diplomat, Ethan West takes up the cause of a U.S. citizen imprisoned abroad. Kirkman discovers a personal betrayal.
episodes.title: Bad Reception

episodes.synopsis: While both parties jockey for Kirkman's allegiance, an old case puts Kendra in the crosshairs. West investigates Moss, who makes a bold announcement.
episodes.title: Target

episodes.synopsis: Kirkman fights to stave off a humanitarian disaster while wrestling to decide his political future. Wells races to protect Rennett's daughter.
episodes.title: Run

episodes.synopsis: Now running for office for the first time, Kirkman and his nascent campaign stumble out of the gate. Wells gets a critical reassignment.
episodes.title: #thesystemisbroken

episodes.synopsis: A heated debate over child marriage roils Kirkman's staff. Opioid addiction hits home for Mars. A biohacker turns Wells onto a chilling new threat.
episodes.title: #slipperyslope

episodes.synopsis: A political attack on Kirkman puts privacy and transgender rights in the spotlight. Aaron weighs a major decision. Wells and Eli track a bioterrorist.
episodes.title: #privacyplease

episodes.synopsis: Aaron's heritage and a widespread teachers' strike become polarizing issues, and Wells discovers a sinister pattern in a flu outbreak.
episodes.title: #makehistory

episodes.synopsis: Emotions run high after despicable fake news goes viral, Isabel makes waves with a controversial appeal, and Wells finds a clue pointing to conspiracy.
episodes.title: #nothingpersonal

episodes.synopsis: A dying Guatemalan child in a Texas hospital brings immigration to the fore. A mugging opens Kirkman's eyes to the realities of life in the capital.
episodes.title: #whocares

episodes.synopsis: A stray Russian bomber jeopardizes Seattle, Mars crusades against a drug company, and an event from Aaron's childhood vexes Kirkman's campaign.
episodes.title: #identity/crisis

episodes.synopsis: Kirkman mobilizes a frantic hunt for the bioterrorist. Lorraine plays hardball and pushes the opioid epidemic into the campaign fray.
episodes.title: #scaredsh*tless

episodes.synopsis: Trailing in the polls, Kirkman weighs forcing the FBI's hand over the bioterrorism plot. Emily struggles with her mother's final wishes.
episodes.title: #undecided

episodes.synopsis: On election day, Kirkman turns to his therapist to assuage his conscience about the events -- and his own decisions -- of the momentous prior 36 hours.
episodes.title: #truthorconsequences
